common.ignoreEmail: If you did not request this email, you can safely ignore it.
welcome.title: Welcome to Govel!
welcome.thankYou: Thank you for registering with Govel. We're excited to have you on board!
welcome.description: Govel is a modern web framework for Go, designed to make web development fast, modular, and scalable. We hope you enjoy using it for your projects.
welcome.support: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our support team.
passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.message: You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.
passwordReset.expiry: This password reset link will expire in {hours, plural, one {# hour} other {# hours}}.
passwordReset.noAction: If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.
passwordReset.trouble: If you're having trouble clicking the "Reset Password" button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser:
verification.title: Verify Your Email Address
verification.message: Thanks for signing up for Govel! Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.security: Verifying your email address helps us keep your account secure and allows you to receive important notifications.
verification.noAction: If you did not create an account, no further action is required.
twoFactor.title: Your Authentication Code
twoFactor.message: You're receiving this email because you requested a two-factor authentication code. Use the code below to complete the authentication process:
twoFactor.expiry: This code will expire in {minutes, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}}.
twoFactor.security: If you didn't request this code, please ignore this email or contact support if you have concerns about your account security.
accountLocked.title: Account Security Alert
accountLocked.message: We've detected unusual activity on your account and have temporarily locked it to protect your information.
accountLocked.warning: Your account has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts.
accountLocked.unlock: If this was you, you can unlock your account by clicking the button below:
accountLocked.advice: If you didn't attempt to log in to your account, we recommend changing your password immediately after unlocking your account.
accountLocked.support: If you need assistance, please contact our support team at {email}.
passwordChanged.title: Password Changed Successfully
passwordChanged.message: We're writing to confirm that the password for your Govel account has been changed successfully.
passwordChanged.login: You can now use your new password to log in to your account.
passwordChanged.security: If you did not change your password, please contact our support team immediately at {email}.
